price: Have they not reflected that their fellow [Prophet] is not insane? He is none but a clear warner.
arabic: أَوَلَمۡ يَتَفَكَّرُواْۗ مَا بِصَاحِبِهِم مِّن جِنَّةٍۚ إِنۡ هُوَ إِلَّا نَذِيرٞ مُّبِينٌ

version.title: English Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
